fields.name: The Digital Gallery
fields.short_description: A stunning, lightning-fast portfolio website designed to showcase your work and attract high-value clients.
fields.description: Your art deserves a world-class online presence. I build visually-driven portfolio websites that are as beautiful and professional as your work. Every site is optimized for performance and designed to look breathtaking on any device.
fields.features:
Visually-driven, custom design
Mobile-first and responsive layout
Optimized for fast loading speeds
Basic SEO to help clients find you
Clear call-to-actions for inquiries

fields.name: The Artisan's E-Commerce Hub
fields.short_description: Turn your passion into profit with a beautiful and seamless online store to sell your products, prints, or digital goods.
fields.description: Ready to sell your work online? I create robust and elegant e-commerce websites that make it easy for you to manage products and for your customers to make purchases. Secure, reliable, and tailored to your brand.
fields.features:
Secure Stripe & PayPal integration
Easy product & inventory management
Customer accounts and order history
Beautiful product pages
Optimized checkout experience

fields.name: Peace of Mind Retainer
fields.short_description: Ongoing support to keep your website secure, updated, and running smoothly so you can focus on your craft.
fields.description: Your website is a critical business asset. My retainer service ensures it stays in peak condition with regular security checks, performance monitoring, software updates, and dedicated support when you need it.
fields.features:
Weekly security scans & updates
Regular cloud backups
Performance monitoring
Content update assistance
Priority technical support

fields.name: Strategic Discovery Session
fields.short_description: Expert guidance to map out your digital strategy, define your project goals, and make informed technology decisions.
fields.description: Have a big idea but not sure where to start? In this focused session, we'll dive deep into your goals and create a clear, actionable plan for your web project, ensuring we build the right solution from day one.
fields.features:
In-depth goal analysis
Technical recommendations
Project roadmap creation
User experience planning
Clear budget & timeline estimates
